duties_responsibilities.duty: Make flexographic and litho plates, and rotary screens.
Responsible for the critical evaluation of all plates/screens made and completes appropriate QA check lists.
Maintains Plate and Screen Tracking Logs.
Verifies information on Plate Envelope is correct.
Responsible for cleaning and maintaining platemaking room/screen room and equipment.
Completes daily audits of staged screens to ensure business rules have been met.
Participates in continuous improvement / Kaizen teams.
Attends department meetings and internal training classes.

skills.skill: Technical expertise in flexo, litho, and rotary screen

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED required; College degree strongly preferred, ideally related to the printing industry.
